title: Image Schema
description: The Images Archetype - Essential properties that define an image

resolution_original.description: URL (as per RFC 3986) to a picture in JPEG, PNG or GIF format at the original resolution it had when it was uploaded

resolution_large.description: URL (as per RFC 3986) to a picture in JPEG, PNG or GIF format at the large resolution it had when it was uploaded

resolution_medium.description: URL (as per RFC 3986) to a picture in JPEG, PNG or GIF format at the medium resolution it had when it was uploaded

resolution_small.description: URL (as per RFC 3986) to a picture in JPEG, PNG or GIF format at the small resolution it had when it was uploaded

resolution_thumbnail.description: URL (as per RFC 3986) to a picture in JPEG, PNG or GIF format at the thumbnail resolution it had when it was uploaded

created.description: Date and time the product was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the product was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
